General.Name: Wistron Information Technology & Services
General.Description: Wistron Information Technology and Services Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an information technology (IT) service provider to Fortune 500 companies in China, Japan, Taiwan, and internationally. It is involved in the development and maintenance of the IT systems; and provides IT consulting and outsourcing services. The company also offers R&D resources and services, which includes research, design, development, testing, deployment, operations, and support of software. In addition, it provides data processing and consulting services, such as multilingual speech semantic analysis, text analysis, and image recognition for AI application development; content and product localization services to customers to design, develop, create, translate, manage, test, and verify content across software, text, images, video, and audio; and talent sourcing services. Further, the company engages in software localization and testing, translation, and desktop publishing business. It serves healthcare, high tech, financial services, and automotive industries. The company was formerly known as Mirrors International, Inc. and changed its name to Wistron Information Technology and Services Corporation in July 2004. Wistron Information Technology and Services Corporation was incorporated in 1992 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
